MailTemplate.textTemplate:
Hi, a password reset was request for ${user.getUsername()}.
In order to complete this request, you need to visit this link:
http://localhost:9080/syncope-enduser/app/#!/confirmpasswordreset?token=${input.get(0).replaceAll(' ', '%20')}
If you did not request this reset, just ignore the present e-mail.
Best regards.
MailTemplate.htmlTemplate:
Hi, a password reset was request for ${user.getUsername()}.

In order to complete this request, you need to visit this link

.

If you did not request this reset, just ignore the present e-mail.

Best regards.

MailTemplate.textTemplate:
Hi, we are happy to inform you that the password request was execute successfully for your account.
Best regards.
MailTemplate.htmlTemplate:
Hi,
we are happy to inform you that the password request was execute successfully for your account.

Best regards.

RelationshipType.description: Relationship of services assigned to service identity role(s)

If service is published at http://host:port/domains/domain1/endusers, then this property expected value is http://host:port","type":"java.lang.String","required":true,"order":1,"confidential":false,"defaultValues":[]},"overridable":true,"values":["http://localhost:9080/choremocks/rest/"]},{"schema":{"name":"principal","displayName":"Principal","helpMessage":"Provide credential to access services","type":"java.lang.String","required":false,"order":3,"confidential":false,"defaultValues":[]},"overridable":false,"values":["admin"]}]
